verbs.description: Former Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort [V: will] await his trial for foreign lobbying charges from jail . Two weeks after special counsel Robert Mueller 's prosecutors dropped new accusations of witness tampering on him , US District Judge Amy Berman Jackson on Friday revoked Manafort 's bail , which had allowed him to live in his Alexandria , Virginia , apartment under house arrest .
